snippet: The skipper Dean Barker and Emirates Team New Zealand completed two nearly flawless races, overpowering Italy’s Luna Rossa to take a 4-1 lead in the Louis Vuitton Cup finals in San Francisco Bay.
abstract: New Zealand takes 4-1 lead over Italy in the Louis Vuitton Cup sailing tournament finals in San Francisco Bay.
lead_paragraph: The skipper Dean Barker and Emirates Team New Zealand completed two nearly flawless races, overpowering Italy’s Luna Rossa to take a 4-1 lead in the Louis Vuitton Cup finals in San Francisco Bay.

headline.main: New Zealand Holds 4-1 Lead in Vuitton Cup Finals
